page.title: 11LOBSTER FISHING
page.content: Good places to set creels are just off {Sandsend}and{Skenstoft.Ling Holm}is also used.The bait is fresh dead fish bought in boxes from Kirkwall.It costs Â£3.00 for a box with the fillets off.The creels are hauled every day but can be left 2 or 3 days.If a {lobster}is caught the toes are tied to stop them eating each other.Thay are put in keep boxes.Up to 25 can be stored.The{lobsters}are shipped to Kirkwall weekly where they are put in {lobster}ponds.Small ones go to restaurants.Bigger ones go to{Germany and{Holland. Every year they cast their shell.A new one is underneath.This one is rubbery at first.The best{lobster}season is {August}to{October.
